narrative_summary: - User requested creation of a new dbt component named 'acme_dbt' pointing to the jaffle_shop repository
- Invoked the **dagster-expert** skill to handle the request
- dagster-expert skill routed to the **dagster-integrations** skill since this involves integration components
- Read dagster-dbt integration documentation to understand the component-based approach
- Read component-based integration reference to learn the scaffolding process
- Created a todo list to track the setup steps (install dagster-dbt, scaffold component, install adapter)
- Installed dagster-dbt package using `uv add dagster-dbt`
- Scaffolded the acme_dbt component using `dg scaffold defs dagster_dbt.DbtProjectComponent acme_dbt --git-url https://github.com/dagster-io/jaffle_shop`
- Verified the generated defs.yaml configuration file pointing to the jaffle_shop repo
- Installed dbt-duckdb adapter library using `uv add dbt-duckdb` (required for jaffle_shop)
- Verified the component was recognized using `dg list components`
- Listed all definitions using `uv run dg list defs` to confirm all dbt models, seeds, and asset checks were successfully loaded
- Completed all tasks and provided summary of the 8 dbt assets and 20 asset checks now available in Dagster
